name: Haunted (itch) (smoula)
description:
Let me introduce my remake of my favourite MSDOS game: "Dangerous Dave in the Haunted Mansion".

Actualy there are first 2 levels and lots of bugs (e.g. slime's moving), but its playable.

I my plan is to complete all 8 levels + make some bonus like survival mode and maybe multiplayer...

You can actualy try it in web browse, but in the future I want to compile to bin executable (Win, Linux)

If you have any ideas or remarks, please let me know.

Controls: Arrows for moving and aiming, Atl/left Shift for jump, CTRL for shoot.
